text:
ArangoDB | Various Roles | Full-Time | REMOTE or Cologne, Germany

ArangoDB is the leading native multi-model NoSQL database, with more than 4 million downloads. It combines the power of graphs, with JSON documents and a key-value store. ArangoDB makes all of your data models accessible with a single declarative query language. Developers can build high-performance applications using a convenient SQL-like query language or JavaScript extensions. Oh, and did we mention it is open source?

- UX/UI Developer (JS, React)

- (Senior) C/C++ Engineer

- Solution Architect - East Coast

- Sales Executive - East Coast

- Technical Support Engineer - US

https://careers.arangodb.com/
